description: unsets config vars for the Salesforce CLI
descriptionLong:
Unsets the local and global configuration variables for the Salesforce CLI.
 Local variables apply only to your current project. Global variables apply in any directory. 

Examples: 
   $ sfdx config:unset defaultusername defaultdevhubusername 
  $ sfdx config:unset defaultdevhubusername -g
global: unset config var globally (to be used from any directory)
globalLong: Unsets the configuration variables globally, so they can be used from any directory.
globalHelp: Add the --global flag to unset config outside of a project.
